DOC.brief_summary: Investigators hypothesize home-based exercise intervention beneficial diabetic risk factor type 2 diabetes mellitus
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Behavior Modification Plasma Adiponectin Insulin Resistance High Risk Subjects Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial design investigate whether home-based exercise could improve adiponectin level , exercise behavior metabolic risk factor ( insulin resistance , metabolic component physical fitness ) subject least diabetic risk factor type 2 diabetes mellitus . Participants randomly allocate either control group home-based exercise group . All participant evaluate outcome measure baseline , 3-month 6-month 9-month follow-up engage intervention .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : At least one follow criterion follow : BMI > =24 kg/m*m , hypertension , dyslipidemia , fistdegree relative parent type 2 diabetes , impair glucose tolerance , gestational diabetes deliver babt weigh > =4.0 kg Ability understand Chinese Taiwanese Diabetes Receiving treatment insulin oral hypoglycemic agent Any serious illness prohibit undertake fitness evaluation
